articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Barcelona in the Primera División
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Ferrari’s Carlos Sainz beats title rivals Max Verstappen and Lando Norris to pole position at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Mexico Grand Prix: Sainz on pole, but Norris 'happy' with third

articles.description: Ex-Liverpool manager Rafa Benitez explains how new Reds boss Arne Slot will learn about the character of his side, for the times they need it most.
articles.title: Why Arne Slot's Liverpool still have a lot to learn about each other - Rafa Benitez

articles.description: Their teams are at opposite ends of the Premier League table, but Man City manager Pep Guardiola says he "will learn" from Southampton boss Russell Martin.
articles.title: Man City 1-0 Southampton: Pep Guardiola says he 'will learn' from Russell Martin

articles.description: Jonathan Agnew ends his time as BBC cricket correspondent reflecting on another England collapse as the tourists fall to a 2-1 series defeat in Pakistan.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Jonathan Agnew on one last collapse from the tourists in his final Test as BBC cricket correspondent

articles.description: Ilia Topuria stuns Max Holloway, knocking him out for the first time in his glittering career, to retain the UFC featherweight title at UFC 308 in Abu Dhabi.
articles.title: UFC 308: Ilia Topuria stuns Max Holloway with Real Madrid legend Sergio Ramos at cage-side

articles.description: Jack Catterall earns his third headline win in a year and puts himself in position for a title fight in 2025 with victory over Regis Prograis in their light-welterweight bout in Manchester.
articles.title: Catterall vs Prograis: Briton wins thriller, plus Campbell Hatton loses

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match report from Aberdeen vs Dundee United in the Scottish Premiership.
articles.title: Aberdeen vs Dundee United: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Wolves boss Gary O'Neil hopes his side can build on Saturday's battling late draw at Brighton and climb the table.
articles.title: Gary O'Neil: Is Wolves' late fightback a turning point for Wolves boss?

articles.description: Bryan Mbeumo scores a 96th minute winner as Brentford beat Ipswich in a seven-goal thriller at the Gtech Community Stadium.
articles.title: Mbeumo scores winner as Brentford beat Ipswich in thriller
